#labels experiments
#This page tells you how to use SASE to run experiments.

= Query=

Currently we don't have a query parser yet, so you have to write your query in a specific format, such that the engine can recognize it. There are multiple sample queries included in the package, you can find them in the 'query' folder.

= Stream=

The stream is generated by the stream generator. You can configurate the stream via a config file. You can find samples in the query folder, and these files has extension of .stream.

= Engine =

You can run the engine either use command or use script.
